title: aram points system
body:
alright so i go 21/6/16 on aram and get an a+.... kinda bummed but all g, but then i got thinking is this just copy pasted from rifts system.

in aram there are no wards, and cs is really low so this would definitely hinder an s rank.

so my question is is the system copy pasted from rift ?

replies.body:
The ranks are determined by your performance on that champ in that role. Since ARAM doesn't have the roles that rift does that would be impossible, same goes for the other game modes. So really it's your performance on that champ in that role in that game mode, with norms/ranked being the "normal" game mode.

ARAM can be pretty polarising as far as scores are concerned, you have massive outliers where people don't die or where people almost only die, so there isn't going to be an obvious bar for about where an S would be in most cases.

Kill participation also seems to be more important that KDA, so that's something to consider as well.
